name: example-axum-app
description: An example Axum app using the axum-napi-bridge.

scripts.bench: npx tsc benchmark/bridge_bench.ts benchmark/express_server.ts benchmark/koa_server.ts --outDir benchmark --target es2022 --module es2022 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --moduleResolution node && node benchmark/bridge_bench.js
